entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 8:05 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: SW 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023
